    VIDEO=./public_data_challenge_v0/track_1/exp_0/videos_fov_0.tiff
    OUTPUT_DIR=./public_data_challenge_v0/track_1/exp_0
    
    # LOCALIZATION
    WINDOW_SIZE = 5
    THRESHOLD_ALPHA = 1.0
    DEFLATION_LOOP_IN_BACKWARD = 1
    SIGMA = 4.0
    LOC_VISUALIZATION = True
    
    
    # TRACKING
    CUTOFF = 2
    BLINK_LAG = 1
    PIXEL_MICRONS = 1
    FRAME_PER_SEC = 1
    TRACK_VISUALIZATION = True
    
    
    # SUPP
    LOC_PARALLEL = False
    CORE = 4
    DIV_Q = 50
    SHIFT = 1
    
    TRACKING_PARALLEL = False
    AMP_MAX_LEN = 1.5
